1.caption_en:
IIoT platforms like Siemens MindSphere require tight interplay between cloud, edge, and field/data‑input layers to support analytics, algorithm training, data storage, and real‑time processing. The slide illustrates these three levels (Cloud, Edge, Data input) and the components that connect them (Data Lake, Edge Controller, sensors, controllers, MindConnect, etc.).

{

  "title": "IIoT Platforms are highly complex data platforms and require an excellent interplay between real world and virtual world",
